A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For Star Wars franchise\,this is a terrible movie\, even comparing to the prequels which at least had better heart to them. This is so full of plot-holes\, weak characters\, and character assassinations (of Luke) too. Just too full of the political correctness driving it. The stupid Holdo (purple-haired lady)\, with Poe and Finn get almost everybody killed by their non-cooperativeness. And Rey is such a Mary-Sue\, we might have to declare a new league of Mary Sue for her alone. I absolutely regret seeing this movie.
